title: Apply for a tax disc refund (form V14)

details.description: Fill in form V14 and send to DVLA to apply for a vehicle tax disc refund
details.more_information:
Check that you're entitled to a refund first - the details are at the start of the form.

You'll need to fill in your personal details exactly as they're shown on your Registration Certificate (V5C), so it's a good idea to have the certificate with you.
details.introduction:
Download and print the vehicle tax disc (vehicle licence) refund form V14. Fill it in and send it to DVLA. The address is on the form.

*[DVLA]: Driver and Vehicle Licensing Agency
expectations: Details of your current Blue Badge, if you have one
